review: Super easy to setup and start using, even with iPhone controller. Bought this to explore free video on Amazon Prime;good value as long as the monitor is around 20". All the free videos samples were noticeably low resolution on my 60"!HDTV system. Whether this is intended or a consequence of putting the HDMI signal through my Pioneer VX70 system cintroller, I don't know. The stick itself also gets quite hot, so I have been leaving it plugged in.
